name: SinCity (yamasan, ossiach, stjost, Ruxee, pangelova, ploty)
name_original: SinCity (yamasan, ossiach, stjost, Ruxee, pangelova, ploty)
description:
Imagine a city lovingly created to provide perfect living conditions. And now imagine being able to wipe out this city with the click of a button. Welcome to SinCity, the game of destruction! Control the environment by unleashing disasters of various intensity to wipe out the population of Antville.

Team members:

Paulina Angelova
Marion Berg
Ruxandra Diaconu
Stefan Jost
Benjamin Kampfer
Thomas Poganitsch
